languages.text: После битвы на Эпитафии Арджента окончательно встала на путь сестры Репентии. Ее прежние задор и рвение уступили место мрачному, холодному смирению. Она искала смерти, однако смерть будто бежала от прежней соратницы Лорд-капитана, или же для нее просто не нашлось достойного врага. Так продолжалось, пока в бою с еретиками на безвестном мире Арджента не бросилась в пламя огромного пожара, чтобы сразить жуткое отродье варпа. Соратники сестры видели лишь тени в огне и слышали предсмертный крик чудовища. Пожар полыхал несколько дней. Когда он потух, среди обугленных руин нашли тело Ардженты, бездыханное, но не тронутое огнем. В одной руке она сжимала пиломеч, в другой — осколок золотой аквилы, с которым не расставалась с момента прибытия в Коронус.

After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. When they finally subsided, Argenta's body was found among the charred rubble, lifeless but untouched by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: После битвы на Эпитафии Арджента окончательно встала на путь сестры Репентии. Ее прежние задор и рвение уступили место мрачному, холодному смирению. Она искала смерти, однако смерть будто бежала от прежней соратницы Лорд-капитана, или же для нее просто не нашлось достойного врага. Так продолжалось, пока в бою с еретиками на безвестном мире Арджента не бросилась в пламя огромного пожара, чтобы сразить жуткое отродье варпа. Соратники сестры видели лишь тени в огне и слышали предсмертный крик чудовища. Пожар полыхал несколько дней. Когда он потух, среди обугленных руин нашли тело Ардженты, бездыханное, но не тронутое огнем. В одной руке она сжимала пиломеч, в другой — осколок золотой аквилы, с которым не расставалась с момента прибытия в Коронус.

traits.locale_text: After the fight on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on a path of Sisters Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave place to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet the death seemed to run from the former companion of the Lord Captain. Or she just couldn't fight a worthy opponent. This was the case, until one day during the fight with heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into the flames of a big conflagration to strike down a horrendous warp-spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the last bellow of the dying beast. The fire burned for several days. When it finally subsided, among the charred rubble Argenta's body was found, lifeless, but unharmed by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in another — a shard of the golden Aquilla she didn't let go of since the moment she arrived in the Koronus.

languages.text: 荒垄碑碣之战结束之后，阿洁塔坚定地踏上了忏悔修女的道路。她以往的热忱已被冰冷肃穆的顺从所取代。她渴望死亡，但在领主舰长这位曾经的同伴面前，就连死亡似乎也逃之夭夭……又或者，她可能只是还没找到足够强大的敌人。时间就这样一点点过去，直至某天，在某个未知世界之中，阿洁塔在与异端分子的战斗中，为了打倒可怕的亚空间怪物而冲进了熊熊燃烧的炼狱。她的同伴们只能看到火焰中闪烁的阴影，听见野兽垂死的咆哮。大火接连烧了好几天，当火焰终于熄灭时，人们在烧焦的废墟中发现了阿洁塔毫无生气的尸体，火焰没能在她身上留下一点痕迹。她的一只手紧握着链锯剑，而另一只手握着的，是她来到扩区后始终随身携带、片刻不离的金色双头鹰碎片。
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. When they finally subsided, Argenta's body was found among the charred rubble, lifeless but untouched by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

languages.text: Nach dem Kampf auf Epitaph folgte Argenta unerschütterlich dem Pfad einer Repentia. Ihr früherer Eifer und Fanatismus wichen einer grimmigen, kalten Resignation. Sie sehnte sich nach dem Tod, doch der Tod schien vor der ehemaligen Gefährtin des Lord Captains zu fliehen ... Oder vielleicht fand sie einfach keinen würdigen Gegner. So blieb es, bis Argenta sich eines Tages auf einer unerforschten Welt im Kampf gegen Ketzer in ein gewaltiges Inferno warf, um eine grauenhafte Ausgeburt des Warp zu vernichten. Ihre Kameraden sahen nur Schatten im Feuer und hörten das Todesheulen des Monstrums. Die Flammen loderten mehrere Tage lang. Als sie endlich verhungerten, wurde Argentas Leiche in dem verkohlten Schutt gefunden, leblos, aber vom Feuer unberührt. In der einen Hand hielt sie ihr Kettenschwert, in der anderen einen Splitter des goldenen Aquila, den sie seit ihrer Ankunft in der Ausdehnung immer bei sich getragen hatte.
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

Ihre Kameraden sahen nur Schatten im Feuer und hörten das Todesheulen des Monstrums. Die Flammen loderten mehrere Tage lang. languages.text: Après la bataille d'Épitaphe, Argenta s'engagea résolument sur la voie des Sœurs Repentia. Sa ferveur et son zèle cédèrent la place à une froide résignation. Elle aspirait à une mort qui semblait fuir devant l'ancienne compagne de route {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... ou peut-être ne parvenait-elle simplement pas à trouver un adversaire capable de la terrasser. Sa vie continua ainsi jusqu'au jour où, combattant des hérétiques sur un monde inexploré, Argenta se jeta dans un énorme brasier pour abattre une monstrueuse abomination du Warp. Ses camarades ne virent que des ombres dans les flammes avant d'entendre le cri d'agonie de la bête. Le feu brûla pendant plusieurs jours et lorsqu'il s'éteignit enfin, on trouva la dépouille intacte d'Argenta parmi les débris calcinés. Elle tenait encore dans une main son épée tronçonneuse et dans l'autre, un fragment de l'Aquila doré qui ne l'avait jamais quittée depuis son arrivée dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. When they finally subsided, Argenta's body was found among the charred rubble, lifeless but untouched by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

Elle aspirait à une mort qui semblait fuir devant l'ancienne compagne de route {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... ou peut-être ne parvenait-elle simplement pas à trouver un adversaire capable de la terrasser. Sa vie continua ainsi jusqu'au jour où, combattant des hérétiques sur un monde inexploré, Argenta se jeta dans un énorme brasier pour abattre une monstrueuse abomination du Warp. Ses camarades ne virent que des ombres dans les flammes avant d'entendre le cri d'agonie de la bête. Le feu brûla pendant plusieurs jours et lorsqu'il s'éteignit enfin, on trouva la dépouille intacte d'Argenta parmi les débris calcinés. Elle tenait encore dans une main son épée tronçonneuse et dans l'autre, un fragment de l'Aquila doré qui ne l'avait jamais quittée depuis son arrivée dans les Étendues.

languages.text: Tras la batalla en Epitafio, Argenta se dedicó por entero a la senda de las Hermanas Arrepentidas. Su antiguo fervor dio paso a una resignación amarga y fría. Ansiaba la muerte, pero la muerte eludía a la antigua compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... o tal vez fuera que no encontraba un oponente a su altura. Así continuó su historia hasta que, un día, mientras se enfrentaba a los herejes de un mundo inexplorado, Argenta se arrojó a unas llamas espantosas para dar el golpe de gracia a un terrible engendro de la disformidad. Sus camaradas solo vieron sombras en el fuego y oyeron el último aullido de la bestia. Las llamas ardieron durante días. Cuando por fin se extinguieron, encontraron el cuerpo de Argenta entre los escombros carbonizados, inerte, pero sin ningún daño por el fuego. En una mano empuñaba su espada sierra, y en la otra, un fragmento del Aquila dorada que había mantenido a su lado desde su llegada a la Extensión.
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

Ansiaba la muerte, pero la muerte eludía a la antigua compañera de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... o tal vez fuera que no encontraba un oponente a su altura. Así continuó su historia hasta que, un día, mientras se enfrentaba a los herejes de un mundo inexplorado, Argenta se arrojó a unas llamas espantosas para dar el golpe de gracia a un terrible engendro de la disformidad. En una mano empuñaba su espada sierra, y en la otra, un fragmento del Aquila dorada que había mantenido a su lado desde su llegada a la Extensión.

languages.text: エピタフの戦いが終わると、アルジェンタはシスター・リペンティアとしての道をたしかに歩みだした。かつてのほとばしるような情熱は、厳格で冷たい諦念に変わっていた。アルジェンタは死を願っていたが、それはロード・キャプテンの一派だった彼女を逃れているかのように思われた…。あるいは、それだけの力の持ち主に彼女が出会えなかったのかもしれない。そんなふうにして時が過ぎたある日、未開の地で異端者と戦っていたアルジェンタは、〈歪み〉から現れた怪物を倒すため巨大な煉獄のなかに身を投じた。仲間たちはただ炎の中にゆらめくいくつかの影を認め、獣の断末魔を聞いた。炎は何日も燃え続けた。ついにそれが鎮まると、焼け残った瓦礫から、炎に触れぬまま命を召されたアルジェンタの亡骸が見つかった。一方の手でチェーンソードを握りながら、もう一方の手には、彼女がエクスパンスに来てから肌身離さず持ち歩いていた、あの黄金の双頭鷲のかけらが残されていた。
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. When they finally subsided, Argenta's body was found among the charred rubble, lifeless but untouched by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: エピタフの戦いが終わると、アルジェンタはシスター・リペンティアとしての道をたしかに歩みだした。かつてのほとばしるような情熱は、厳格で冷たい諦念に変わっていた。アルジェンタは死を願っていたが、それはロード・キャプテンの一派だった彼女を逃れているかのように思われた…。あるいは、それだけの力の持ち主に彼女が出会えなかったのかもしれない。そんなふうにして時が過ぎたある日、未開の地で異端者と戦っていたアルジェンタは、〈歪み〉から現れた怪物を倒すため巨大な煉獄のなかに身を投じた。仲間たちはただ炎の中にゆらめくいくつかの影を認め、獣の断末魔を聞いた。炎は何日も燃え続けた。ついにそれが鎮まると、焼け残った瓦礫から、炎に触れぬまま命を召されたアルジェンタの亡骸が見つかった。一方の手でチェーンソードを握りながら、もう一方の手には、彼女がエクスパンスに来てから肌身離さず持ち歩いていた、あの黄金の双頭鷲のかけらが残されていた。

languages.text: Sinyazıt'taki muharebe sonrasında Argenta, büyük bir kararlılıkla Tövbekâr Rahibe olma yolunu seçti. Eski coşkusu ve hevesinin yerini, katı ve soğuk bir teslimiyet aldı. Çok arzuladığı ölüm, Lord Kaptan'ın eski yoldaşından sürekli olarak kaçıyordu. Belki de Rahibe, kendisine layık bir rakip bulamıyordu. Hayat böyle devam etti, günün birinde haritalandırılmamış bir dünyada kâfirlere karşı savaşıp korkunç bir öte yaratığını öldürmek üzere kendisini devasa bir ateşin içine attı. Yoldaşları, yalnızca ateşin içindeki gölgeleri görüp yaratığın ölüm feryatlarını duydu. Alevler günlerce dinmedi. Nihayet söndüklerinde Argenta'nın bedeli, yanıp kül olmuş molozların içinde bulundu. Ölü olsa da alevler ona dokunmamıştı. Bir eliyle motorlu kılıcını, ötekiyle ise Enginlik'e geldiğinden beri hep yanı başında tuttuğu altın Çift Başlı Kartal parçasını tutuyordu.
languages.original_text: After the battle on Epitaph, Argenta was firmly set on the path of a Sister Repentia. Her former fervour and zeal gave way to grim, cold resignation. She longed for death, yet death seemed to flee before the former companion of the Lord Captain... Or, perhaps, she just could not find a worthy opponent. So things carried on, until one day, while fighting heretics on an uncharted world, Argenta threw herself into a massive inferno to strike down a horrendous warp spawn. Her comrades saw only shadows in the fire and heard the beast's dying bellow. The flames burned for several days. When they finally subsided, Argenta's body was found among the charred rubble, lifeless but untouched by the fire. In one hand she held her chainsword, in the other — a shard of the golden Aquila she had always kept close ever since arriving in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Kitabe'deki savaşın sonrasında Argenta, büyük bir kararlılıkla Tövbekâr Rahibe olma yolunu seçti. Eski coşkusu ve hevesinin yerini, katı ve soğuk bir teslimiyet almıştı. Ölümü arzuluyordu ancak görünüşe göre ölüm, Lord Kaptan'ın eski yoldaşından sürekli olarak kaçıyordu. Veya belki de kendisine layık bir rakip bulamıyordu. Yaşamı böylece devam etti, ta ki Argenta bir gün haritalandırılmamış bir dünyada kâfirlere karşı savaşırken, korkunç bir öteboyut yaratığını indirmek için kendisini devasa bir infernonun içine atana kadar. Yoldaşları yalnızca ateşin içindeki gölgeleri gördüler ve yaratığın ölüm feryatlarını duydular. Alevler günlerce dinmedi. Nihayet söndüklerinde Argenta'nın bedeli yanıp kül olmuş molozların içinde bulundu. Ölüydü ancak alevler ona dokunmamıştı. Bir elinde motorlu kılıcını, diğer elinde ise Enginlik'e geldiğinden beri hep yanı başında tuttuğu altın Çift Başlı Kartal parçasını tutuyordu.
